text: *Found a bug in hs-form:* If the form contain a file upload field and you submit the form without checking the gdpr-checkboxes it will not submit. After checking the gdpr-checkboxes it still not be able to submit. Looks like an error in the React component of the file upload. I suggest something with componentDidUpdate and Redux:
